sections.title: Firmware
sections.content: Do not change the operating system setting in the BIOS from Windows to Linux. This causes the built in keyboard to become unresponsive during boot-time (although USB keyboards still work) and reverses the backlight controls.

sections.title: Audio
sections.content:
Note: **This article or section is out of date.** This article or section is out of date.

This article or section is out of date.

The HDMI port works but it does not support audio output, it seems to be a common problem with intel devices and Linux right now.
